General.Description: There is a kind of ryptocurrency that does more than transfer money is Nexus. Beyond Bitcoin and other first generation crypto currencies, Nexus (NXS) is considered as an innovative crypto currency, which has a checks and balances system and can retrieve the transactions when sending to a wrong address. Furthermore, this coin runs off its own algorithm, therefore, it was rated to be 2% up to a coin having capability of 78 million.
General.Features: By the decentralized Peer to Peer Networks, Nexus can connect people around the world. Moreover, through three channels of security such as The Prime block producers; the Hash block producers; and the Staking block producers, NXS can run fast, securely for all transactions. In addition, to checks and balances in consensus and Trust Keys which are rated as the greater security and network stability. Last but not least, Nexus is compatible with its transaction system and the hardware infrastructures.
General.Technology: The NXS is sucessful in building the consensus via a novel hybrid Proof-of-Work (PoW) and Proof-of-Stake (PoS) algorithm. With the cap of 78 million, NXS is also the huge data storage system, that makes all of your transactions fast and convenient.
